verses.roman:
śrī-bhagavān uvāca
hanta brahmann aho śambho
he devā mama bhāṣitam
śṛṇutāvahitāḥ sarve
śreyo vaḥ syād yathā surāḥ

synonyms: śrī-bhagavān uvāca—the Supreme Personality of Godhead said; hanta—addressing them; brahman aho—O Lord Brahmā; śambho—O Lord Śiva; he—O; devāḥ—demigods; mama—My; bhāṣitam—statement; śṛṇuta—hear; avahitāḥ—with great attention; sarve—all of you; śreyaḥ—good fortune; vaḥ—for all of you; syāt—shall be; yathā—as; surāḥ—for the demigods.
translation: The Supreme Personality of Godhead said: O Lord Brahmā, Lord Śiva and other demigods, please hear Me with great attention, for what I say will bring good fortune for all of you.
